clearable.description: Whether to enable the clear icon, the input box will be cleared after clicking the clear icon
clearable.description_zh: Whether to enable the clear icon, the input box will be cleared after clicking the clear icon

disabled.description: Whether it is disabled or not
disabled.description_zh: Whether it is disabled or not

id.description: The id of the input element, usually used with label
id.description_zh: The id of the input element, usually used with label

max.description: Maximum value, only valid when type is number
max.description_zh: Maximum value, only valid when type is number

min.description: Minimum value, only valid when type is number
min.description_zh: Minimum value, only valid when type is number

readOnly.description: Whether it is readonly or not
readOnly.description_zh: Whether it is readonly or not

events.name: onChange
events.description: Triggered when the input content is changed
events.description_zh: Triggered when the input content is changed

events.name: onClear
events.description: Triggered after clicking the clear button
events.description_zh: Triggered after clicking the clear button

events.name: onEnterPress
events.description: The callback when Enter key is pressed
events.description_zh: The callback when Enter key is pressed

events.name: onlyShowClearWhenFocus
events.description: If true, the clear button will only be displayed when the input box is focused. If false, the clear button will still be displayed after the input box loses focus.
events.description_zh: If true, the clear button will only be displayed when the input box is focused. If false, the clear button will still be displayed after the input box loses focus.

methods.name: blur
methods.description: Let the input box lose focus
methods.description_zh: Let the input box lose focus

methods.name: focus
methods.description: Let the input box get focus
methods.description_zh: Let the input box get focus
